::DarkMouse::

She looked at Destructor.  She wanted to say something, then thought 
better of it and just stood there.  She knew that she was nothing 
more than a worthless mouse.  


She was about to ask one of the maximals to kill her and put her out 
of her misery. But then with the energon on her body, that wouldn't 
be such a good idea.  She'd live anyway.  She looked around and then 
got an idea.  She thought that maybe she could prove herself.  She 
nudged Destructor's shoulder and whispered,"PSSSST, I got an idea. I 
think I know a way to convince them."  she walked out and towards the 
maximals.  She had her hands raised above her head and kept her body 
posture in a submissive state.  She walked slowly and carefully over 
towards the maximals. She looked at them and then focused her eyes on 
Ramulus. She put her hands down at her side  and bowed to him.  "I..I 
am DarkMouse.  I..I am willing to give you a gift, my gift, if you 
will let us help build the ark with you."  She quickly drew a small 
dagger from her side and gave herself a deep cut in her wrist.  She 
held out her arm so that The maximals might see the cut.  The mech 
fluid and energon mixture glowed as it flowed out of the cut.  Then 
the cut started to heal up.  In a matter of a few moments, the cut 
was completely healed.  "This is my gift to you if you will trust us 
and let us help you."  She looked at him with real Sencerety on her 
face.  She really was going to give them her secret.  She coudn't 
believe she was doing this, but her spark was now being guided by 
something.   She hoped it was the matrix.
